name: CLAuthorizationStatus
desc: Constants indicating the app's authorization to use location services.

items.name: case notDetermined
items.desc: The user has not chosen whether the app can use location services.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The app is not authorized to use location services.

items.name: case denied
items.desc: The user denied the use of location services for the app or they are disabled globally in Settings.

items.name: static var authorized: CLAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: The user authorized the app to use location services.

items.name: case authorizedAlways
items.desc: The user authorized the app to start location services at any time.

items.name: case authorizedWhenInUse
items.desc: The user authorized the app to start location services while it is in use.
